构造方法详细信息

FilesContainer

public FilesContainer(String name,
                      List<FilesObject> objs,
                      FilesClient client)
Create a new container (Note, this does not actually create a container on the server)

参数：
name - The name of the container
objs - The objects in that container
client - The client we are currently using

FilesContainer

public FilesContainer(String name,
                      FilesClient client)
参数：
name - The name of the container
client - A logged in client

Adds a new object to the container

参数：
f - The file for this object
mimeType - It's MIME type
